mapper.insert: INSERT INTO style(styleno, categoryno, managerno, title, name, rname, like1, email, content,cnt,image,image_name,thumb,sizes,pay,times,rdate) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(styleno), 0)+1 as styleno FROM style), 1,1,#{title},#{name},#{rname},#{like1}, #{email},#{content},#{cnt},#{image},#{image_name}, #{thumb}, #{sizes}, #{pay}, #{times}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT styleno, categoryno, managerno, title, name, rname, like1, email, content,cnt,image,image_name,thumb,sizes,pay,times,rdate FROM style ORDER BY styleno
SELECT styleno, categoryno, managerno, title, name, rname, like1, email, content,cnt,image,image_name,thumb,sizes,pay,times,rdate FROM style ORDER BY cnt DESC
SELECT styleno, categoryno, managerno, title, name, rname, like1, email, content,cnt,image,image_name,thumb,sizes,pay,times,rdate FROM style ORDER BY like1 DESC
SELECT styleno, categoryno, managerno, title, name, rname, like1, email, content,cnt,image,image_name,thumb,sizes,pay,times,rdate FROM style ORDER BY rdate DESC
